Yes Lord Jesus!
I have set before you life and death...blessing and curse.
We choose LIFE! Lord keep us holding fast to You!
Amen, Lord, we gladly choose You, we choose Life:):)
He is my real life and length of my days!
We were visiting Boston and we were singing in the university. It is enjoyable!! I could't forget.
This is an awesome song! I LOVE IT!!!!!!!
Hold Fast to Him! He is our life and the length of our days! He is are true hope, and our reality :) Oh Lord I love You, be my life and everything!
In loving Jehovah your God by listening to His voice and holding fast to Him; for He is your life and the length of your days.
Yes, we need to choose life.

"By considering the enactment of the covenant in Deuteronomy 29 and 30, we can see that what is on God's heart concerning His people is that they would cooperate with Him. To keep the commandments, the statutes, and the judgmentsâ€”this is just to cooperate with God. This is what God wants us to do. We need to say, "Lord, I stand with You. I take You, Your will, and Your word." However, we should not try to do this in ourselves and by ourselves. To do this is to insult the Lord. We should simply cooperate with Him by letting Him do everything. If we do this, we will become not the doers but the enjoyers. Then everything will be fulfilled." Life-Study of Deuteronomy, Chapter 27, Section 5

The Lord give us the free will either to choose death or life but He reminded us to choose life in order that we and our seed may live. Hallelujah since we love the Lord may we be those persons who listen to His voice. Not only to listen but to hold fast to Him cos He is our very life, not only the life but He is the length of our days.
If we choose death we will be cursed, if we choose life we will be blessed. Therefore brothers and sisters, CHOOSE LIFE.
It seems everyday we face many choices, between this and that, but actually we're just choosing between life and death. But nevertheless, we must choose life!
